title: Bug 114470[Smoke]Error message throws when using new Date("3/2/2005") as value in table filter.
description: When using the value new Date("3/2/2005") as the input for a table filter, an error message is being thrown.
OB: An error message is being thrown when using new Date("3/2/2005") as the value in a table filter.
EB: There should not be an error message thrown when using new Date("3/2/2005") as the value in a table filter.
SR:
1. Create a new datasource and dataset that contains a datetime column.
2. Insert a table.
3. Add a filter based on the datetime column.
4. For value1 in the filter, input new Date("3/2/2005").
